DOC.brief_title: Study Antenatal Model Prevent Preterm Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: The standard antenatal care nowadays answer preterm delivery problem . Thus , comprehensive proactive approach need prevent preterm delivery . This antenatal model consist midwife training , early detection bacterial vaginosis , pregnant woman campaign self administer pH check
